DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the FROST DEATHKNIGHT when:

  • They have the Obliteration talent and Pillar of Frost is active (or not talented).
  • They have the Breath of Sindragosa talent with its buff active and Pillar of Frost is active (or not talented).
  • They don’t have Obliteration or Breath of Sindragosa and Pillar of Frost is active (or not talented).
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
<｜fim▁begin｜>

行列の乗算は、2つの行列の要素同士を掛け合わせて新しい行列を生成する演算です。行列A（m×n）と行列B（n×p）の乗算が可能な場合、結果の行列C（m×p）の各要素Cijは、以下のように計算されます：

\
Cij = \sum_{k=1}^{n} Aik \times Bkj
\

ただし、行列乗算が定義されるためには、最初の行列の列数と2番目の行列の行数が一致している必要があります。結果の行列のサイズは、最初の行列の行数×2番目の行列の列数となります。

### 例：
行列A（2×3）：
\
A = \begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 3 \\
4 & 5 & 6 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\

行列B（3×2）：
\
B = \begin{bmatrix}
7 & 8 \\
9 & 10 \\
11 & 12 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\

結果の行列C（2×2）：
\
C = \begin{bmatrix}
(1×7 + 2×9 + 3×11) & (1×8 + 2×10 + 3×12) \\
(4×7 + 5×9 + 6×11) & (4×8 + 5×10 + 6×12) \\
\end{bmatrix}
= \begin{bmatrix}
58 & 64 \\
139 & 154 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\

### ポイント：
- 非可換性: 一般に \( A \times B \neq B \times A \)（サイズが異なる場合や計算結果が異なるため）。
- 結合則: \( (A \times B) \times C = A \times (B \times C) \) が成立します。
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the HAVOC DEMONHUNTER when:

  • The Demon Hunter activates Metamorphosis, as this aligns with their major burst window.
  • The encounter is within 20 seconds of ending to maximize damage before the fight concludes.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the BALANCE DRUID when:

  • They activate Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to amplify their major damage window.
  • Warrior of Elune is active, ensuring rapid Starfire casts during the haste buff.
  • Their Astral Power is sufficiently high to maximize burst damage potential during the buff duration.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the FERAL DRUID when:

  • The druid activates their Berserk ability to enhance their burst phase.
  • The druid does not have the Berserk talent selected (using Heart of the Lion instead).
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the DEVASTATION EVOKER when:

  • They activate Dragonrage while Shattering Star is on cooldown.
  • They activate Dragonrage while the Shattering Star debuff is active on their target.
  • They activate Dragonrage with 2 or more enemies present.
  • The encounter will end in less than 35 seconds, regardless of other conditions.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the MARKSMANSHIP HUNTER when:

  • Their Trueshot buff has more than 12 seconds remaining to maximize cooldown synergy.
  • The encounter will end within 13 seconds to ensure the full duration is utilized.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the SURVIVAL HUNTER when:

  • They are currently affected by Coordinated Assault.
  • They do not have Coordinated Assault talented and Spearhead is on cooldown.
  • They have neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talented.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • They do not have Spymaster's Web and just cast Arcane Surge (aligns with their burst window).
  • They have Spymaster's Web and just started Evocation (trinket synergy with mana phase).
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the FIRE MAGE when:

  • Power Infusion is not active, and the Mage is about to cast Combustion (within their pre-cast timing window).
  • Combustion is already active and has more than 7 seconds remaining on its duration.
  • The encounter will end in less than 20 seconds.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the FROST MAGE when:

  • They are using Icy Veins to maximize their burst damage window.
  • They are casting major cooldowns such as Frozen Orb or Glacial Spike.
  • The Frost Mage does not already have the Power Infusion buff active.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the WINDWALKER MONK when:

  • The Windwalker Monk has Xuen the White Tiger active.
  • Bloodlust is not active, or during Bloodlust, the Monk's Strike of the Windlord is available to use.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the RETRIBUTION PALADIN when:

  • the paladin has Avenging Wrath active, increasing their damage output
  • the paladin has Crusade active, during their burst window
  • the target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff, amplifying its final damage
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the SHADOW PRIEST when:

  • They are in Voidform.
  • They have Dark Ascension active.
  • They have the TWW 2.4 set bonus active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the ASSASSINATION ROGUE when:

  • The rogue has Deathmark active on their target to amplify their burst damage window.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the SUBTLETY ROGUE when:

  • They activate Shadow Dance, as this aligns with their burst window and amplifies their stealth ability usage.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the ELEMENTAL SHAMAN when:

  • The Shaman has Ascendance active.
  • The cooldown of Ascendance has more than 30 seconds remaining (to avoid delaying Power Infusion).
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the ENHANCEMENT SHAMAN when:

  • They have the Ascendance buff active.
  • They have the Feral Spirit summon active.
  • They have the Doom Winds buff active.
  • There are fewer than 20 seconds remaining in the encounter.
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the AFFLICTION WARLOCK when:

  • The warlock has Summon Darkglare and Soul Rot active to maximize damage amplification during their burst window.
  • Their core offensive cooldowns are synchronized, ensuring Power Infusion aligns with their highest scaling damage phase.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the DEMONOLOGY WARLOCK when:

  • The Warlock is summoning Demonic Tyrant and their imps are about to despawn within a short timeframe.
  • The Warlock has recently cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination immediately before summoning Demonic Tyrant.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the DESTRUCTION WARLOCK when:

  • The Warlock’s Summon Infernal is currently active during their burst window.
  • The Warlock does not have the Summon Infernal talent selected in their build.
  • The remaining encounter duration is shorter than the time until their next Summon Infernal cooldown (plus 15 seconds), ensuring it is used before the fight ends.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the ARMS WARRIOR when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter will last at least 135 seconds.
  • The warrior is in the Execute phase (target below 20% health) and has Avatar active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the FURY WARRIOR when:

  • Avatar has more than 15 seconds remaining and the encounter will last at least 135 more seconds.
  • The target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, regardless of other conditions.
